landing.slogan: Your next Event Meal starts here
landing.saveTimeDesc: No more phone calls and emails to meal providers fill out one form and receive multiple quotes from restaurants and caterers in your area
landing.discoverIdeasDesc:
All of our meal providers are unique.
Discover new and classic ideas for your next event meal
landing.enjoyEventDesc: Compare multiple quotes and communicate directly with restaurants and caterers through the EventMeal platform.
landing.appDownloadDesc: For convenient access to multiple meal quotes
landing.missionDescription_p1: Your next event, family gathering, party, business meeting or convention is just around the corner. One thing all of the above EVENTS have in common is a MEAL, but wait! Who has the time call numerous restaurants and caterers to compare quotes on a meal for your event? Itâ€™s time to simplify the process of finding the perfect meal for your next gathering. Welcome to EVENTMEAL, where with a few simple taps of the screen you can have multiples quotes from matching meal providers in your city competing for your business! EVENTMEAL will save you time and money as well as introduce you to new ideas for your next meal
landing.missionDescription_p2: EventMeal is dedicated to putting you in touch with local food providers that will match your needs as accurately as possible, while also opening you up to new ideas and local businesses that you may not have known existed. It is our mission to provide the best possible match for your next Event Meal!

pages.aboutUs: In 2020 during the pandemic the Event Meal team was born. A team dedicated to providing meal vendors and consumers, an efficient and simple platform to request and receive quotes for event meals. Our team consists of Restaurant industry professionals as well as web development professionals. We are here to create an affordable timely solution to an otherwise prolonged process.
